dct_title_s: Mappe-monde, ou carte generale du monde
dct_description_sm: par le sr. Sanson d'Abbeville, geographe ordinaire de sa majeste ; Riviere, sculp.
California shown as a labeled island with a flat northern coast. Sierra Nievada and Nouvelle Albion labeled to the northwest.
Great lakes are shown, but open to the west. Australia is partially shown, labeled Beach. Van Dieman's Land and New Zealand not shown.
